entry.name: logs-sedes-internet-educacion
entry.query: ( addr.dst in 10.0.0.0/8 ) and not ( addr in 10.1.20.0/24 ) and not ( addr in 10.158.88.0/24 ) and not ( addr in 172.16.201.0/24 ) and not ( addr in 172.16.202.0/24 ) and not ( addr in 172.16.203.0/24 ) and not ( addr in 172.16.204.0/24 ) and not ( app eq incomplete ) and not ( app eq snmpv1 ) and not ( app eq snmpv2 ) and not ( app eq insufficient-data )

entry.name: hiva-aqueronte
entry.query: ( addr.src in 172.16.201.2 ) and (( addr.dst in 10.1.20.183 ) or ( addr.dst in 10.1.20.110 ) or ( addr.dst in 10.1.20.97 ) or ( addr.dst in 10.1.20.92 ) or ( addr.dst in 10.1.20.15 ) or ( addr.dst in 10.1.20.5 ))

entry.name: Usuarios sin identificar.
entry.query: ( user.src eq '' ) and ( zone.dst eq SAP ) and ( ( addr.src in '10.57.46.0/24') or (addr.src in '10.57.10.0/24') or (addr.src in '10.57.40.0/24') or (addr.src in '10.57.41.0/24') or (addr.src in '10.52.40.0/24') or (addr.src in '10.11.30.0/24') or (addr.src in '10.12.140.0/24') or (addr.src in '10.76.40.0/24') or (addr.src in '172.20.6.0/24'))

entry.query: (start geq '2018/08/29 11:00:00') and (start leq '2018/08/29 11:30:00') and ( zone.src eq MPLS ) and (bytes geq 500000000)

entry.name: Malware detectado hacia DMZ
entry.caption: Malware detectado hacia DMZ
entry.query: (zone.src eq OUTSIDE) and (zone.dst eq Perimetro2S_Red) and (subtype eq spyware)

entry.name: Spyware_to_DMZ-Detalle
entry.caption: Spyware_to_DMZ-Detalle
entry.query: (zone.src eq OUTSIDE) and (zone.dst eq Perimetro2S_Red) and (subtype eq spyware)

entry.name: Malware desde DMZ
entry.caption: Malware desde DMZ
entry.query: (zone.src eq DMZ ) and (zone.dst eq S_Red2Perimetro) and (subtype eq spyware)

entry.name: Spyware_from_DMZ-Detalle
entry.caption: Spyware_from_DMZ-Detalle
entry.query: (zone.src eq DMZ ) and (zone.dst eq S_Red2Perimetro) and (subtype eq spyware)

entry.name: Top App 1
entry.caption: Top App 1
entry.query: (( vsys_name eq USUARIOS ) or ( vsys_name eq RED ) or ( vsys_name eq INFORMACION )) and ((addr.src in '10.0.0.0/8') or (addr.src in '172.16.0.0/12') or (addr.src in '192.168.0.0/16'))

entry.name: Top App Internet 1 -Zonas
entry.caption: Top App Internet 1 -Zonas
entry.query: ( zone.dst eq S_Red2Perimetro ) or ( zone.dst eq Usuarios2Perimetro ) or ( zone.dst eq S_Info2Perimetro )

entry.name: Top App Internet 1 -Zonas-1
entry.caption: Top App Internet 1 -Zonas
entry.query: ( zone.dst eq S_Red2Perimetro ) or ( zone.dst eq Usuarios2Perimetro ) or ( zone.dst eq S_Info2Perimetro )

entry.name: Trafico SAP PI .74 MPLS
entry.caption: Trafico SAP PI .74 MPLS
entry.query: (addr.dst in 10.158.88.74) and (vsys eq vsys3) and (zone.src eq MPLS) and (addr.src notin '10.1.25.0/24') and (addr.src notin '10.1.70.0/24')

entry.name: Trafico Servicio SAP PI .74
entry.caption: Trafico Servicio SAP PI .74
entry.query: (addr.dst in 10.158.88.74) and (port.dst eq 50200) and (vsys eq vsys3) and (zone.src eq MPLS) and (addr.src notin '10.1.25.0/24') and (addr.src notin '10.1.70.0/24') and (addr.src notin '172.16.209.0/24') and (addr.src notin '172.16.209.0/24')

entry.name: Trafico SAP PI .74
entry.caption: Trafico SAP PI .74
entry.query: ((addr.src in 10.1.20.5) or (addr.src in 10.1.20.15) or (addr.src in 10.1.20.23) or (addr.src in 10.1.20.92) or (addr.src in 10.1.20.97) or (addr.src in 10.1.20.110) or (addr.src in 10.1.20.183) or (addr.src in 172.16.201.2) or (addr.src in 172.16.201.15) or (addr.src in 172.16.201.17) or (addr.src in 172.16.201.47) or (addr.src in 10.1.20.168)) and (addr.dst in 10.158.88.74) and (vsys eq vsys3)

entry.query: (action eq allow) and ( app neq insufficient-data ) and ( app neq incomplete ) and ( app neq snmp ) and ( app neq snmp-base ) and ( app neq snmpv1 )and ( app neq snmpv2 ) and ( app neq snmpv3 ) and ( app neq snmp-trap ) and ( app neq icmp ) and ( app neq ping ) and ( app neq dhcp ) and ( app neq dns ) and ( app neq ntp ) and ( (zone eq VPN_C2S) or (zone eq VPN_Bancolombia) or (zone eq VPN_Exponencial) or (zone eq VPN_Comfamigos) or (zone eq VPN_Solati) or (zone eq VPN_Netdata) or (zone eq VPN_Cadena) or (zone eq VPN_InterLAN) or (zone eq VPN_Compuredes) )
